std_inline.citation:
'''Marriage''': "eGGSA Marriage Registers, Maria Margaretha Wilhelmina Smith"
Source: Nederduits Gereformeerde Gemeente (NGK), Drakenstein, . marriage register, 1824-1839, page 56. Repository: NG Kerkargief, Noordwal-Wes, Stellenbosch, G3 5/2. Transcribed by Richard Ball, from photographs of Cape Archives VC 655 Note: Data in square brackets [ ] indicates unreadable or doubtful reading. Dates in ( ) are derived from the date of the previous entry. Dates in double square brackets [[ ]], usually [[01]] indicate that there was no day entered in the register
[https://www.eggsa.org/cgi-bin/dosearchMarriages.pl eGGSA BMD Record] with search parameters Groom with hamman anywhere in the surname with eduard anywhere in the first name, in all the registers. (accessed 6 May 2021)
Maria Margaretha Wilhelmina Smith (17) marriage to Eduard Christiaan Hamman on 7 Dec 1834.

std_narrative.citation:
Maria (age 17) married Eduard Christiaan Hamman on 7 December 1834. '''Marriage''': "eGGSA Marriage Registers, Maria Margaretha Wilhelmina Smith"
